DOC.brief_summary: The study show new salt formulation GSK372475 equivalent old salt formulation GSK372475 .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Males/Females age 1845 year Nonsmokers BMI 1930 kg.m2 QTc < 450msec Use oral contraception Positive breath alcohol drug screen Regular alcohol consumption Current psychiatric illness within 1 year . History GI , hepatic renal disease Uncontrolled hypertension
